prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey! Just checking in to see how your day is going.  
Reminder: Your dentist appointment is tomorrow at 3 PM.  
Order confirmation: Your package will arrive between 1 PM and 3 PM tomorrow.  
Can we reschedule our meeting to next Thursday?  
Don’t forget to bring the documents for the presentation on Monday.  
Just wanted to say I had a great time last night!  
Your OTP code is 123456. Please enter it to complete your login.  
The community picnic is this Saturday at the park. Hope to see you there!  
Hey, are you free for coffee this weekend?  
Your subscription for the monthly magazine has been renewed successfully.  
I saw your message! Let’s catch up later this week.  
The bank transaction of $150 has been processed successfully.  
Looking forward to our team-building event next Friday!  
Could you send me the report by end of day?  
I just wanted to remind you about the family gathering on Sunday.  
Your flight has been delayed by 2 hours. Please check your email for updates.  
Thanks for your help with the project! I appreciate it.  
Hey! Are we still on for the movie tonight?  
Just dropping a quick note to say I’m thinking of you.  
Please confirm your availability for the meeting on Tuesday at 10 AM.  
Your appointment with the stylist is confirmed for Saturday at 1 PM.  
I’m here if you need to talk about anything.  
The event starts at 6 PM, so be sure to arrive early.  
Your password was successfully changed. If this wasn’t you, please contact support.  
Let’s plan a weekend trip soon! It would be fun.  
Thank you for your order! You will receive a tracking link shortly.  
Your feedback on the recent project was very helpful, thanks!  
The kids have a soccer game this Saturday at 10 AM.  
Just a heads up, I’ll be out of the office next week.  
I’m really proud of you for finishing that project!  
Please let me know if you can make it to the dinner next Friday.  
Your electricity bill is due on the 15th.  
Just wanted to remind you about the car maintenance appointment on Monday.  
Hope your presentation goes well! You’ve got this!  
Your subscription will renew on the 5th of next month.  
Thanks for the update, I’ll review the details and get back to you.  
Looking forward to seeing you at the concert next month!  
Just confirming that we’re still on for our lunch date tomorrow.  
Your grocery delivery has been scheduled for 2 PM today.  
Could you please send me the link to the meeting?  
Hope you have a great day at work!  
The RSVP for the wedding is due by next week.  
I’m here if you need anything, just let me know.  
Your account has been successfully verified.  
The team is excited about the upcoming project kickoff!  
Don’t forget to check your email for the agenda before our meeting.  
Your credit card statement is ready to view online.  
Just wanted to say I appreciate your support lately!  
The neighborhood watch meeting is on Wednesday at 7 PM.  
I’ll be at the gym from 5 PM if you want to join me.  
Thanks for being a great friend, I value our chats!  
Your loan application is being processed and you will receive an update soon.  
Looking forward to our weekly catch-up call on Friday!
